question.title: How I send animated sticker in whatsapp from my custom keyboard
question.body: so i builded a app that have custom keyboard where i can use to share sticker, i'm able send the non-animated stickers easily but when it come the animated sticker it's not, as from the whastapp documentation about sending stickers i have to add in the whatsapp sticker collection from their i can choose to send the sticker, but when i look gboard and bobble keyboard they are able to share them preety easily just tap and it sended both animated and non animated how?? . i use this mime type "image/webp.wasticker " for non-animated sticker so Is there any workaround for the animated stickers?
